description: The Corpse Reviver No. 2 is a cocktail with the perfect balance of tart flavor and alcohol content. This class drink has stood apart from other recipes since its inception!
name: Corpse Reviver No. 2
recipeIngredient: 1 oz. Lillet Blanc, Cocchi Americano, or dry vermouth
1 oz. Premium orange liqueur like Cointreau or Grand Marnier
Orange peel or orange wedge, for garnish

recipeInstructions.name: Rinse the inside of a chilled cocktail or coupe glass with the absinthe, then remove the excess.

recipeInstructions.name: Pour the gin, vermouth, orange liqueur, and lemon juice into an ice-filled cocktail shaker.

recipeInstructions.name: Shake thoroughly, then strain it into the prepared glass.
